Defending the interests of all the light races

The Coalition Defense Force is a structured role play military organization on the Vallon Zek Server of Everquest. As an army we are based on the foundation of service. We have been commissioned under the nobel title of our leader and his claim to keep the lands of Fironia Vie and the area of the Lake of Ill Omen free trade and safe havens for the light races. We are organized and fight to protect those lands and keep them to benefit the light races. We will press to keep the Dark races out of our lands and prevent those of light races that would attempt to brack the peace we have established.




Click on a book to select a subject to find out about.

The Coalition Defense Force is a Role Play guild. If you are not interested in a role play theme in which you are a soldier in an army that serves a commander, then this is not the place for you. We are not looking for people that have large egos and want to claim some kind of personal power over others. We are not looking for people that want to join out of some desire to gain items within the game. We want people that want to have fun in developing an overall story within the game and fighting wars against our enemies as a member
